General.Name: Innovative Payment Solutions Inc
General.Description: Innovative Payment Solutions, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides digital payment solutions and services to businesses and consumers primarily in Mexico. It develops and operates e-wallets that enable consumers to deposit cash, convert it into a digital form, and remit the funds. The company's flagship e-wallet is IPSIPay, a retail customer product, which focuses on the consumer market. It also offers Beyond Wallet that focuses on the business market. The company was formerly known as QPAGOS and changed its name to Innovative Payment Solutions, Inc. in November 2019. Innovative Payment Solutions, Inc. is based in Carmel-by-the-Sea, California.
General.Address: 56B 5th Street, Lot 1, Carmel-By-The-Sea, CA, United States, 93921
